Package suncertify.core

Class Summary
ApplicationContext ApplicationContext is a context class that contains configuration details for all system needed in different places along the whole system hierarchy.
Contractors Contractors is the main class of this application - its responsibility is to instantiate relevant ICommand class based on mode flag passed by the user and execute it.
DBHelper DBHelper is a low-level operations database helper.
PropertyLoader A simple class for loading Properties backed by .properties files deployed as classpath resources.
StringHelper StringHelper is an utility class providing simple methods that operate on strings and string representation of different number types.
 

Exception Summary
InitializationException InitializationException is thrown during database helper initialization in case of any IO failure (e.g. database file does not exist; cannot read to read-only file, etc.).
